statements: UPDATE customer_support_tickets SET status='Resolved' WHERE ticket_id = 101

UPDATE support_tickets SET status='Resolved' WHERE ticket_id=101;

UPDATE support_agents SET department='Sales', agent_name='Bob' WHERE agent_id=201;

UPDATE ticket_notes SET note = 'Customer informed about resolution' WHERE ticket_id = 101 AND agent_id = 201;

UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', address = '123 Main Street, New City' WHERE customer_id = 201
